system.useTime:
Lore of the Wander: The Navigator gains Talented(Navigation(Warp)) Talent.
A Taste for the Warp: The Navigator can spend a Fate Point to automatically suceed in using a Navigator power with 1d5-1 degrees of success.
Scorn of the Dirt Dwellers: Suffer -10 to all Fellowship Tests and skills based on Fellowship when on a planetary body and deal with such locals.
Initial Mutation: Begin with a single Navigator Mutation, rolled randomly. Additional mutations may be gained when new Powers or Mastery is gained.
